name: Holiday Cake Forzen Star
description:
Holiday Cake Forzen Star is a very addictive match-3 game!
Match and collect the colorful cookies, and enjoy sweet tasty desserts! New delicious desserts arrived! Crush all the levels with the shortest time!
Features:
- Two game modes
- Very small size
- Over 99 interesting levels
- A variety of delicious cookies
- Sweet graphics and stunning effects
